summary: I TOOK MY TRUCK IN FOR SERVICE TO FIND THE HEATER CORE WAS BAD.  TO REPLACE, THE DASHBOARD WOULD HAVE TO BE REMOVED.  I ALREADY HAD A SMALL CRACK IN THE DASH LOCATED RIGHT ABOVE THE PASSENGER AIRBAG. AFTER SERVICE WAS PERFORMED AT THE DEALERSHIP, THE DASHBOARD NOW HAS TWO MORE CRACKS IN IT.  THE DEALERSHIP SAID I WILL HAVE TO PAY 40% AND THE CLOCK IN NOW TICKING.  THE LONGER I WAIT, THE LESS GMC WILL PAY TO REPLACE.  EVEN THOUGH THE SERVICE ADVISOR TOLD ME THAT GMC IS HAVING TROUBLE WITH THE DASH CRACKING, PEELING, ETC.
